entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Slave Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:38 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Slave Lake Airport 09:41 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 0.5°C
Wind: WNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with freezing rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with freezing rain ending this morning then clearing. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
